enhanced_by.reason: Fetching loanable assets data is necessary to ensure the loanCoin and collateralCoin are valid before borrowing.
Fetching collateral assets data is necessary to ensure the collateralCoin is valid and has sufficient collateral limit.
The method can be used to verify that the loan order has been successfully created and is ongoing.
The method can be used to verify that the loan borrow action has been recorded in the history.
